reviewtext: I like this headset so much, I have already purchased 3 of these headsets, not all at once though.  The first headset that I bought, I have had for a few years now, and it is still working as good as new.I have had other similar headsets, and these are the best sounding ones when playing music.  They are also very light weight and comfortable to wear.  For the price (currently under $5), I highly recommend them!Suggested improvements:  Volume switch on cord and foldable
